page.title: 03PATHHEAD:ITS POPULATION
page.content: { { THE PRESENT POPULATION OF PATHHEAD IS APPROXIMATELY 900.IN 1980 THE POPULATION WAS APPROXIMATELY 850,THIS IS AN INCREASE OF 5.5%.AT THE BEGINNING OF THIS CENTURY (1901)THE POPULATION OF PATHHEAD WAS 400 AND IN 1865 THE POPULATION NUMBERED 3O0.THIS INCREASE IS DUE TO MANY FACTORS. 1.MANY NEW HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT DURING THE LAST 100 YEARS. 2.PATHHEAD IS A DESIRABLE AREA WITHIN EASY COMMUTING DISTANCE TO EDINBURGH. 3.PATHHEAD IS A SPACIOUS AND PEACEFUL VILLAGE WITHIN EASY REACH OF THE CITY AND THE SEA. THE POPULATION OF PATHHEAD HAS MORE THAN DOUBLED DURING THE LAST 100 YEARS AND WILL NO DOUBT CONTINUE TO INCREASE IN YEARS TO COME.
